DOC.brief_summary: This trial compare two treatment method : 1 . Orlistat 60 mg take three time daily one capsule ; indicate weight loss overweight adult . Important also take along reduced-calorie low-fat diet . 2 . Polyglucosamine tablets take two time daily two tablet , take two main meal high fat content , indicate weight maintenance weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: RCT Compare Orlistat Polyglucosamine Management Overweight Obesity
DOC.criteria: BMI ≥ 28 kg/m² < 45 kg/m² Waist circumference > 80 cm ( woman ) > 94 cm ( men ) Energy intake low standard value accord Miffin StJeor equation Pregnancy breastfeed Addiction alcohol Inability fulfil requirement trial protocol Cancer , malignant tumour Hypersensitivity reaction crustaceans ingredient study medication Chronic diseases control adequate therapy Diabetes
